org.oucs.oxpoints.entities.pool.filters
Class EntityFilter

java.lang.Object
  org.oucs.oxpoints.entities.pool.filters.EntityFilter

public abstract class EntityFilter
extends java.lang.Object

EntityFilters can be used to guide the creation process of OxPointsEntityPools.

EntityFilters are an easy to use high-level tool to filter the entities that are added to an OxPointsEntityPool. However, the filters are only applied after the entity was created, thereby having a slight drawback on the performance in contrast to, for example, (properly written) SPARQL filters.

Version:
0.1
Author:
Arno Mittelbach
See Also:
OxPointsEntityPoolConfiguration, OxPointsEntityPool

filterEntity

public abstract boolean filterEntity(OxPointsEntity entity)
Performs the actual filter operation.

Returns false if the entity did not pass the filter criteria. True otherwise.

Parameters:
entity - The entity to be filtered.
Returns:
false|true (reject|pass).
